sentences.en: A religious psychotic in Las Vegas has killed four people.
sentences.cn: 拉斯维加斯一名患有精神病的宗教狂热分子已经杀死了4人。
亚力克斯: 那些企鹅有神经病.

sentences.en: Anyone who talks to you gets a glare or a psychotic smile in return.
sentences.cn: 任何和你说话的人都会遭到你的怒目而视或者被回以神经质的笑容.

sentences.en: As she developed an observing ego, it helped her recognize when she was having psychotic symptoms.
sentences.cn: 当她发展了观察中的自我, 这帮她承认她有精神病症状的时刻.

sentences.en: Cooper panics and has a psychotic attack, locking herself in the chapel.
sentences.cn: Cooper感到恐慌,发作了精神症状, 将她自己锁在小礼堂里.

sentences.en: He was afraid that he was becoming psychotic.
sentences.cn: 他因变成具有精神病而恐惧.

sentences.en: HOUSE: you talk to God, you're religious. God talks to you, you're psychotic.
sentences.cn: 你和上帝说话, 你是信仰者, 上帝和你说话, 你就是精神病.

sentences.en: I'll dig a psychotic rodent if I have to.
sentences.cn: 我可以像土拨鼠一样疯狂挖洞!

sentences.en: Run, run, run, run away from my psychotic teammate!
sentences.cn: 逃啊, 逃啊, 逃啊, 逃离我的精神病队友!

sentences.en: So psychotic epileptic disorder is really your own pet theory?
sentences.cn: 那精神癫痫性失调只是你对自己理论的爱称?

sentences.en: That kind of thinking is probably more psychotic than a person who hoards money.
sentences.cn: 这种人比敛财的人病得更重.

sentences.en: The group is now studying the brains of people with other types of psychotic disorders.
sentences.cn: 这个研究小组现在正在研究其他类型的神病人的脑变化.

sentences.en: The man, who police believe is psychotic, is thought to be responsible for eight attacks.
sentences.cn: 这个警方认定为精神错乱的男子被认为是8起袭击事件的制造者。

sentences.en: These results underscore the value of rescue medications in averting psychotic relapse.
sentences.cn: 这些结果显示了救护性治疗对避免精神病复发的价值.

sentences.en: You want to put yourself in the path of a psychotic killer?
sentences.cn: 你要把自己陷入那个变态凶手的陷阱中 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: 精神性欲的；有性特性的
心理物理学；精神物理学
心理生理学；精神生理学

trans.tran_en: suffering from or caused by psychosis
